title: FS: T206 Young Portrait - SGC Blazer SOLD
author: Chesbro41

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Young Portrait - SGC Blazer SOLD
posts.post_content:
FS... T206 SGC 30 Young Portrait. It's near flawless with perfect centering and nice registration, no creases. Way better than a 30 visually. Believe there were pencil marks on the back originally but I can't find them.

SOLD
